label: The Weaver and the Hound
column5: After the death of a skilled weaver named Knowles from Dean Combe
column6: his ghost appears weaving at his loom until a priest forces him to leave. As punishment for his worldly desires
column7: the weaver's spirit is transformed into a hound and condemned to an eternal task at Hound's Pool.

label: The Gwyllgi
column6: The frightful apparition of a mastiff with blazing red eyes
column8: haunted Pant y Madog near Laugharne
column10: terrifying a woman named Rebecca Adams as it approached her and emitted an earth-shaking scream. This spectral dog is said to still haunt Carmarthenshire
column11: as reported by witnesses in Llangynog who have seen such apparitions.

label: A Familiar Spirit In The Shape Of A Dog And The Lonely Night Traveller.
column5: A man from Cilcwm was returning home late at night through a lonely mountainous area when he encountered a friendly black dog walking beside him. Upon reaching home
column7: leading the man to believe it was a familiar spirit sent by a wizard to keep him company on his journey.
